data.title: Crisis, 1713–1714
data.meta_description: By 1713–1714 tensions along whig and tory party lines in Ireland reached an unprecedented peak. At this time domestically produced publications began to offer overtly partisan commentary on Irish politicians and political affairs. In the run-up to the general...
